text: Love on the Run may refer to: * Love on the Run (1936 film), starring Clark Gable and Joan Crawford * Love on the Run (1979 film), a French film directed by François Truffaut * Love on the Run (1985 film), a 1985 made-for-television film starring Alec Baldwin * Love on the Run (1994 film), a 1994 American TV film * Love on the Run (2016 film) * Love on the Run (TV series), on MTV * "Love on the Run" (song), a 2003 song by Chicane * "Love on the Run", a song by Scorpions, from the 1988 album, Savage Amusement * "Love on the Run", an episode of the television comedy Diff'rent Strokes * "Love on the Run", an episode of the television comedy Major Dad
title: Love on the Run
